thread.title: Samsung Galaxy C7 Pro spotted on company’s India website, launch imminent
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy C7 Pro spotted on company’s India website, launch imminent

title: Samsung Galaxy C7 Pro spotted on company’s India website, launch imminent
text:
Samsung Galaxy C7 Pro spotted on company’s India website, launch imminent Samsung Galaxy C7 Pro spotted on company’s India website, launch imminent By March 21, 2017 “The Galaxy C7 Pro is a high-end phablet with a premium design” 
In January, Samsung unveiled its latest Galaxy C series smartphone, the Galaxy C7 Pro in China. Now it appears that the company is all set to launch the phone in India. Ahead of an official announcement, the Samsung Galaxy C7 Pro with model number SM-C701F has been spotted on the country’s website in India. The phone was launched in China for around Rs 28,000, and is expected to be priced similarly range in India. 
For the uninitiated, the Samsung Galaxy C7 Pro features a premium metal unibody design, a split antenna band design and a fingerprint sensor that’s integrated into its home button. The phone sports a large 5.7-inch Super AMOLED full HD display, and is powered by a 2.2GHz octa-core processor, mated to 4GB of RAM. 
The Galaxy C7 Pro features 64GB of storage, which can be further increased up to 256GB by inserting a microSD card. The phone sports 16-megapixel cameras on both the front and back. In terms of connectivity, it features a 4G LTE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.2, NFC, a USB Type-C port and GPS. A 3,300mAh battery completes the list of the specs. Facebook Comments
